Author: mithro_
Content:
# **üåê wafer.space Community Rules**

Welcome to the wafer.space Discord server!

This is a community for discussing open-source silicon, the GF180MCU PDK, and building projects through wafer.space‚Äôs low-volume silicon manufacturing service.

----

By joining, you agree to follow these rules to help keep this space friendly, constructive, and enjoyable for everyone:

## 1. Family-Friendly Environment

Keep all conversations safe for all ages.
No adult (X-rated/R-rated) content, explicit language, or otherwise inappropriate material.

## 2. Zero Tolerance for Hate

Racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, or any form of discrimination will not be tolerated.
Nazis, extremist ideologies, or related symbols/messages are not welcome here.

## 3. Respectful & Constructive Feedback

Keep discussions supportive and positive.
Do not insult people or their projects‚Äîeven if you think something is ‚Äúsilly‚Äù or a duplicate of your own work.

This community is a safe place to learn, explore new ideas, and make mistakes.

## 4. Stay On Topic

Use the correct channels for your posts.
Off-topic chatter should go in designated spaces.
Solicitation, self-promotion, and advertisements are only allowed in the appropriate channels.

## 5. Moderation & Bans

Moderators reserve the right to take action‚Äîincluding banning members‚Äîfor any reason, to protect the health of the community.

If in doubt, ask a moderator before posting.

‚úÖ By staying in this server, you agree to these rules.

----

Together we can keep wafer.space a friendly, collaborative, and inspiring place for everyone interested in open silicon.
